mapper.insert: insert into myreceive ( userId, releaseid, dividedid, subtaskId_1, subtaskId_2, subtaskId_3, subtaskId_4, subtaskId_5, subtaskId_6, subtaskId_7, subtaskId_8, subtaskId_9, subtaskId_10 ) values ( #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_8,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_9,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subtaskid_10,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select id, userId, releaseid, dividedid, subtaskId_1, subtaskId_2, subtaskId_3, subtaskId_4, subtaskId_5, subtaskId_6, subtaskId_7, subtaskId_8, subtaskId_9, subtaskId_10, ifComplete from myreceive
select * from myreceive where userid = #{param1} and id=#{param2}
select * from myreceive where userid = #{userid} and ifcomplete = #{ifcomplete}
mapper.update: update myreceive set ifcomplete = #{ifcomplete} where id = #{id}
